description.value: ValueSet containing drug identifiers to exclude. Criteria is explicitly stating topical, gel, cream, ointment, foam, lotion, otic, or ophthalmic formulations.

purpose.value: To refine valueset for Warfarin + NSAID PDDI-CDS
